short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: mayak.switchray.com is a publicly available demo-site for a SwitchRay WebRTC-based audio/video conferencing & screensharing solution

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin for Chrome enables screen capturing and sharing functionality inside the latest WebRTC release of the company to leverage the key technology capabilities in a click-to-communicate way.
